knimeNode.name: USearch Clustering (local)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Supports running a local usearch executable for rapid sequence clustering at a given identity threshold

fullDescription.intro: Supports running a local usearch executable for rapid sequence clustering at a given identity threshold. USearch can be found at Robert Edgar's website (the author of the multiple alignment program: MUSCLE).

ports.inPort: Must include a single column of sequences for clustering
ports.outPort: All going well, this is the list of sequences which are centroids
All going well, this is the list of sequences which are consensus sequences of each cluster. Different to centroids (usually).
